item.title: New York:3-Day Niagara Falls US,Washington DC Tour w/3rd&4th Free
item.description: Discover the East Coast beyond New York with this 3-day, multi-stop tour. Travel to Washington D.C. via Philadelphia to explore the nation's capital. Continue on to visit Corning and the US side of Niagara Falls, with the option to ride the iconic Maid of the Mist, visit Cave of the Winds, and more (all activities at an additional cost).

image.alt: New York:3-Day Niagara Falls US,Washington DC Tour w/3rd&4th Free

item.title: The Escape Game New Jersey: 60-Minute Adventure at American Dream
item.description:
Our NJ location features 6 immersive escape rooms, including our newest game, The Depths, and our most difficult adventure, Prison Break. Each escape room holds up to 8 players excluding Playground, which can accommodate up to 12 players.
These adventures offer a one-of-a-kind premium experience. Follow clues and solve puzzles to complete your mission together. We offer the best escape rooms and the fastest customer support. Come see why our escape rooms win awards.
We offer shared experiences, which means multiple groups can book into the same game. If you would like to ensure a private experience, make sure to book all available spots. If the available spots do not match the game capacity, that means another group has already booked spots in this game.

image.alt: The Escape Game New Jersey: 60-Minute Adventure at American Dream

item.title: New York City Skyline Helicopter Tour from New Jersey
item.description:
See breathtaking views of New York City as you fly into the city from Essex County Airport in New Jersey. Essex County airport in New Jersey is accessible by a 45-minute taxi ride from Midtown or via public transportation from the Port Authority Building in NYC on 42nd Street.
Sit back for the ride of your life on your 30–35-minute journey showcasing iconic landmarks like the American Dream Mall and Metlife Stadium before reaching the Statue of Liberty, One World Trade Center, the Empire State Building, and more.
A once in a lifetime experience you are sure to never stop talking about!

image.alt: New York City Skyline Helicopter Tour from New Jersey

item.title: Private EWR Airport transfer / New York City (One Way)
item.description: Reserve reliable transportation for your arrival to New York City with this private transfer from Newark Airport to Manhattan. Get picked up curbside at Newark Airport in New Jersey and receive help with your luggage. Travel in the comfort of an air-conditioned vehicle to the address of your choice in Manhattan. Flight monitoring is included. The reverse route, from Manhattan to Newark Airport, is also available.

image.alt: Private EWR Airport transfer / New York City (One Way)

item.title: Washington D.C.& Philadelphia 2-Day Tour from New York City
item.description: Visit Philadelphia and Washington D.C. and see numerous important landmarks with this overnight tour from New York City. Visit the Independence National Historical Park in Philadelphia. In Washington D.C., visit the exterior of the Capitol, Supreme Court, and the White House, various memorials, and enjoy a nighttime bus tour around the city.

image.alt: Washington D.C.& Philadelphia 2-Day Tour from New York City

item.title: American Dream DreamWorks Indoor Water Park Ticket
item.description: Open year round, and one of the largest indoor water parks in the country, DreamWorks Indoor Water Park is a family-friendly destination located just a few miles from New York City—and this advance booking option enables a stress-free visiting experience. Book your tickets before you travel, and arrive at a time that works best for you. You can explore highlights like its many slides, indoor wave pool and more, all at your leisure.

image.alt: American Dream DreamWorks Indoor Water Park Ticket

item.title: LEGOLAND Discovery Center Westchester Admission Ticket
item.description: Kids — and accompanying grown-ups — will find no end to challenging their imaginations at LEGOLAND® Discovery Center Westchester, located in Yonkers. Spend an activity-filled day of LEGO®-building fun at multiple attractions, from constructing cities from LEGO bricks to testing the fastest vehicle at LEGO Racers. View New York City landmarks at Miniland and relax at the 4D Cinema with a LEGO movie. Brave adventurers can tackle rides like Merlin’s Apprentice and Kingdom Quest Laser Ride, while little ones find playtime action at the DUPLO® Village.

image.alt: LEGOLAND Discovery Center Westchester Admission Ticket

item.title: 7-Day Philadelphia, D.C, Niagara Falls, Boston Tour from New York
item.description: Embark on a 7-day tour from New York to explore iconic city landmarks and experience the charm of historic East Coast destinations. Marvel at the breathtaking views of majestic waterfalls, tour the prestigious Harvard University, and indulge in authentic Boston lobster at the famous Quincy Market. This carefully curated journey blends culture, history, and nature for an unforgettable experience. Enjoy our Buy 2, Get 2 Free promotion when 3 or 4 guests share one room, making it ideal for families and groups! Optional upgrades with admission fees are available to enhance your adventure.

image.alt: 7-Day Philadelphia, D.C, Niagara Falls, Boston Tour from New York

item.title: Paramus Indoor Skydiving Experience with 2 Flights & Personalized Certificate
item.description: Experience the thrill of skydiving without jumping from an airplane by skydiving at an indoor venue in New Jersey. The 75-minute session at iFLY Paramus teaches you how to skydive in a state-of-the-art vertical wind tunnel. Your instructor provides all equipment and training, and accompanies you during your two flights. This activity is suitable for most people, and no experience is necessary.

image.alt: Paramus Indoor Skydiving Experience with 2 Flights & Personalized Certificate

item.title: New York City Night Lights Helicopter Tour from New Jersey
item.description: Whether you’re new to the city or have lived there your entire life, experiencing New York at night by air is a unique experience. See the sparkling lights of New York City from the seat of a helicopter and view landmarks like the Statue of Liberty and the Empire State Building from the top.

image.alt: New York City Night Lights Helicopter Tour from New Jersey

item.title: Private New York City Airport-to-Airport Transfer (JFK/LGA/EWR)
item.description: If your connecting flight in New York requires you to change airports, eliminate the stress of unknown travel times and catching a taxi with this convenient private transfer. A professional driver will pick you up at your arrival airport—JFK International Airport, LaGuardia Airport, or Newark Liberty International Airport—and take you directly to the airport where your next flight departs.

image.alt: Private New York City Airport-to-Airport Transfer (JFK/LGA/EWR)

item.title: American Dream Nickelodeon Universe Indoor Theme Park Ticket
item.description: Enjoy a day out with the whole family at New Jersey’s Nickelodeon Universe Indoor Theme Park—one of the world’s largest indoor amusement parks—without the stress: purchase your tickets before you travel to ensure your entry. Once inside the park, located just a few miles from New York City, kids of all ages can take advantage of its dozens of rides and attractions, as well as live entertainment offerings.

image.alt: American Dream Nickelodeon Universe Indoor Theme Park Ticket

item.title: Private Arrival Transfer: NYC Airports (JFK) (LGA) (EWR) to Brooklyn
item.description: Enjoy a hassle-free arrival in New York with this pre-booked private transfer service from NYC airports to Brooklyn. With a professional driver to pick you up and take you directly to your hotel or private residence, you don’t have to wait on other travelers or navigate public transportation. Plus, you can relax and enjoy the sights from a comfortable sedan, minivan, or SUV.

image.alt: Private Arrival Transfer: NYC Airports (JFK) (LGA) (EWR) to Brooklyn

item.title: Newark International Airport Stretch Limousine Service
item.description: Start your New York City trip in style when you book a private stretch limousine airport arrival service. Upon landing in Newark International Airport, meet your driver directly upon collecting your luggage and hop aboard your luxurious limo. Then, settle in for a comfortable ride into the city, without worrying about navigating yourself. Soft drinks are provided on board and Champagne is available on request.

image.alt: Newark International Airport Stretch Limousine Service

item.title: SEA LIFE New Jersey at American Dream
item.description: The SEA LIFE Aquarium, conveniently located in the American Dream Mall in New Jersey, offers a fun activity for the whole family. It’s safe and stroller-accessible, and you’ll see some of the ocean’s most fascinating creatures across several interactive exhibits. Save time and skip the lines to buy tickets by securing your tickets beforehand.

image.alt: SEA LIFE New Jersey at American Dream

item.title: Half Day New York City Private Tour
item.description:
Explore the Best of New York City: Your Ultimate Private Tour Experience! Welcome to the city that never sleeps, the iconic New York City! Are you ready to embark on an unforgettable journey through the Big Apple's most iconic landmarks? Look no further! We are thrilled to offer you an exclusive opportunity to discover the vibrant heart of New York City through our private tour tailored for small groups and families. Sit back, relax, and allow us to take you on an extraordinary adventure through the bustling streets of this magnificent metropolis!
With our private tour, you won't have to worry about crowded buses or fixed schedules. Instead, enjoy the freedom of a tailored itinerary that suits your preferences and pace. We will pick you up directly from your chosen address, ensuring a hassle-free and comfortable journey.

image.alt: Half Day New York City Private Tour

item.title: New York 4-Day Tour to Niagara Falls & Washington,3rd&4th Free
item.description: Welcome to join our 4 days trip by travel with thoroughly disinfected sightseeing coach and our professional well-trained tour escort. We will be visit and pack an array of top landmarks and attractions on the east coast, learning more about local culture and history. Experience the Wonder of Nature, taking an in-depth visit to Niagara Falls, getting astonished by the power of nature and spectacular view! Visit the World Top Universities and walk into the world top ranked universitiy-- Havard University. You will have the Foodie’s Choice such as grab a bite of authentic local taste, check out the fresh products at Quincy Market and enjoy a real Boston lobster meal.

image.alt: New York 4-Day Tour to Niagara Falls & Washington,3rd&4th Free

item.title: Westchester Indoor Skydiving Admission with 2 Flights & Personalized Certificate
item.description: Take your New York vacation to the next level - without getting in a plane - and experience the adrenaline rush of skydiving in a vertical wind tunnel. Offered all day until 10pm, you can pick a session that fits in with your schedule. After small-group training, enjoy two 60-second solo sessions in the tunnel. Your guide provides one-on-one instruction for both sessions to ensure you have the best experience possible.

image.alt: Westchester Indoor Skydiving Admission with 2 Flights & Personalized Certificate

item.title: New York City Helicopter Tour at Night
item.description:
The best selling New York City helicopter tours departing from the conveniently located Essex County Airport in NJ.
Explore the rich history, cultural significance, and architectural marvels that shape New York City's vibrant tapestry. Our tour promises breathtaking views, creating lasting memories. Discover iconic sights like the Statue of Liberty, Ellis Island, One World Trade Center, Chrysler Building, Empire State Building, Chelsea Piers, Times Square, The Intrepid, American Dream Mall, MetLife Stadium, and Newark Airport.
Please note: a minimum of 4 passengers is required for this unforgettable experience.

image.alt: New York City Helicopter Tour at Night

item.title: EWR to Manhattan: Private Airport Arrival Transfer
item.description:
Embark on a journey of comfort and convenience with our 24-hour private airport transfer service from Newark Liberty International Airport to your accommodation in Midtown Manhattan/Lower Manhattan. Bid farewell to the hassles of long taxi queues and crowded public transport.
Experience a personalized service tailored to your schedule and needs. Our professional drivers are committed to providing a seamless transition from the airport to your chosen destination.
Leave flight worries behind! Your designated driver will keep a close eye on your flight, ensuring a prompt pickup even in the case of delays (within 90 minutes for arrivals). Relax knowing that your journey is in capable hands.
Say goodbye to the burden of lugging around heavy bags and navigating complex public transportation systems. Our door-to-door service allows you to unwind and enjoy the journey without unnecessary stress.

image.alt: EWR to Manhattan: Private Airport Arrival Transfer

item.title: American Dream Indoor Ice Skating Rink Ticket
item.description: Take a spin on The Rink at American Dream, an NHL regulation size ice rink. Your ticket guarantees your spot on the ice for the date you selected. Have fun with the whole family with skates and helmet rental included.

image.alt: American Dream Indoor Ice Skating Rink Ticket

item.title: Newark International Airport (EWR) to New York - Arrival Private Transfer
item.description: Make the journey after a flight a stress-free experience by opting for a private transfer instead of waiting in long taxi lines. No need to worry about delayed flights—the driver tracks your flight when you’re in the air and meets you with a board with your name on it. Once you’ve met the driver, travel with ease directly to your chosen New York destination in a comfortable air-conditioned vehicle.

image.alt: Newark International Airport (EWR) to New York - Arrival Private Transfer

item.title: Private Arrival Newark Liberty Airport EWR to Manhattan by Car
item.description: Avoid the hassle of planning a last-minute ride while you’re in a new city with this private transfer from Newark Liberty Airport (EWR) to your Manhattan hotel. Along with a comfortable ride in a private vehicle, you’ll enjoy a super-easy pickup from the airport—just meet your chauffeur in baggage claim and look for a sign with your name on it.

image.alt: Private Arrival Newark Liberty Airport EWR to Manhattan by Car

item.title: Washington D.C. ,Niagara Falls 5-Day Tour from New York
item.description:
【Eastern US】Pack an array of top landmarks and attractions on the east coast, learning more about local culture and history.
【Modern Craftsmanship】Visit Corning Glass Center and watch the exquisite and exquisite glass craftsmanship.
【The Big Apple】Visit iconic sites, buildings, and parks in New York, one of the most prestigious cities.
【Wonder of Nature】Take an in-depth visit to Niagara Falls, getting astonished by the power of nature and spectacular view!
Room Details All hotel rooms are based on two Full / Double beds or one King/Queen bed depends on what hotel availiable on the day. The maximum occupancy per room is four travelers.
One Room Selection If you are a party of more than four guests or desire to have separate rooms, please provide a separate booking.
Avoid traveling in a different bus? If you have more than one booking, please provide all confirmation numbers once your bookings are complete.

image.alt: Washington D.C. ,Niagara Falls 5-Day Tour from New York
